EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi John,
You are very welcome. I look forward to working with you and please let me know when you have any additional information about the project and we can follow up then. Enjoy your time off at home!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: John Loomis [mailto:johnloomis@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 23, 2012 11:32 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Information
Nicolette, Thanks for all the info today. I'm now trying to contact Scott Waterman. I'll get back with you when I hear from him. Thanks, John
From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com To: johnloomis@hotmail.com Date: Mon, 23 Jan 2012 11:00:52 -0500 Subject: MBO Partners Information Hi John,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful:
We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here. In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here. Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. If you have question, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule.
I look forward to speaking with you again soon,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
